texts.text: After eating the porridge made for us by Izumo, Yonagi and I head to the recreation room.
Yonagi goes over to one of the shelves and comes back with a pen and notebook in hand.
I can see the gears turning in her head as she looks at the blank page with a smile playing around her lips.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: So there's a boy and a girl. They're both sleeping in a white room.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: She wants to talk to the boy, but she can't talk very well.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Didn't you hear me? They're sleeping in the white room.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: But the boy's sleeping in that room too, right? Why can't they talk?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: The girl is sleeping in a much whiter place much, muuuch deeper down.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: She's not really in the room.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: She can see a lot of things from there, but she can't get out.
Yonagi keeps staring at the notebook, deep in thought.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Only the end is sad. But the whole story before that is happy. Very happy.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Somehow, I don't think I've ever written before.
She says, pressing the end of the pen to her lips and jiggling her legs up and down.
After eating the porridge made for us by Izumo, Yonagi and I head to the recreation room.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Hm? Isn't this supposed to be a play?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: We have alcohol, and we also have food if you want.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: What would you like to drink?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: The water here is bad, though.
The same as the dream, then.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Then I'll have a cup of ale.
Yonagi pulls a cylindrical object out of the toybox.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Yes, it's done. Here you go.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Thank you very much. Glug glug...

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: You look like a horse stepped on your face today.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: You want to tell me about your bad day, right?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Come on, out with it. It'll help you feel better.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Um, well, I kind of can't remember who I am or where I am.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I suppose that's one way to put it, yeah.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: All you can do in moments like this is drink.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Whoa, you drink like a fish. Here, have another.
We repeat the same exchange until I finish "drinking" my eighth cup of ale.
After being told I've lost sight of myself eight times in a row, I feel like it's actually happening.
After eating the porridge made for us by Izumo, Yonagi and I head to the recreation room.
Yonagi drags a chair into the middle of the room.
I sit down on the chair, and Yonagi wraps a colorful cloth around my neck.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: How do you want your hair?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: There, I cut it a little. Do you feel refreshed?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: You're a pretty girl right now.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: And I'll make you even prettier.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: I'll put the eyeliner on you now. Close your eyes, please.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Now I'll put on the lipstick.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: I told you not to open your mouth, remember?
